Num.FuncTxt: local time = 5000 local over = GetBuffOver(self, "Jaguar_Wild_Buff") return time * over
local time = 5000 local over = GetBuffOver(self, "Jaguar_Wild_Buff") return time * over

Str_Arg.FuncTxt: local name = "F_scout_WildHowling_ground" local scale = 1.7 local abilBuff = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "WildHowling_Hidden_Buff") if abilBuff ~= nil then scale = 1.3 end return name, scale

Num.FuncTxt: local value = 80 local abil = GetAbility(self, "Jaguar4") if abil ~= nil and TryGetProp(abil, "ActiveState", 0) == 1 then value = 60 end return value

Str_Arg.FuncTxt: local name = "F_scout_WildHowling_ground" local scale = 2.2 local abilBuff = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "WildHowling_Hidden_Buff") if abilBuff ~= nil then scale = 1.6 end return name, scale

Num.FuncTxt: local value = 100 local abil = GetAbility(self, "Jaguar4") if abil ~= nil and TryGetProp(abil, "ActiveState", 0) == 1 then value = 75 end return value
